title: Mr. Garofalo Goes To Washington
itunes:title: Mr. Garofalo Goes To Washington
description:
In what led to the Presidency for Ronald Reagan, our own David Garofalo went to Washington DC this past week where he campaigned for justice, the justice of cigar smokers. Joined by the likes of Glynn Loope, Rocky Patel, Rafael Nodal and countless others they walked the halls of the Senate soliciting Senators and Representatives to leave premium cigars alone.

We will also be joined by Jeremy Soares the New England sales rep for My Father cigars who will be on hand in Seabrook, NH to talk with us about what 2015 will have in store for this company owned by the Garcia family.

As for what else, who knows and Mr. Jonathan took over the show preparations this week, and why the boss is away, who knows what will be in store without a voice of reason.

Join us for all the shenanigans known as The Cigar Authority.
